body: I hope we're not planning to leave it like that, right? Those explicit type casts are usually unnecessary in Python, because scalar tensors that don't require grad behave pretty much like regular Python numbers (and are treated like that in our Python dispatch)
body_html: I hope we're not planning to leave it like that, right? Those explicit type casts are usually unnecessary in Python, because scalar tensors that don't require grad behave pretty much like regular Python numbers (and are treated like that in our Python dispatch)
